name: RetrieveInvoices
description:
Retrieve sales invoices or purchase bills from Xero.

Use this tool to retrieve detailed information about sales invoices or purchase bills from Xero.

parameters.name: xero_tenant_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a Xero tenant to retrieve invoices specific to that tenant.

value_schema.description: Xero identifier for Tenant

parameters.name: filter_by_condition
parameters.description: Filter using a condition expression defined on any element, similar to a SQL WHERE clause.

value_schema.description: Filter by an any element

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Specify the criteria for ordering invoices, such as date or amount.

value_schema.description: Order by an any element

parameters.name: invoice_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Invoice IDs to filter results.

value_schema.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoicesIDs.

parameters.name: filter_by_invoice_numbers
parameters.description: Filter results by providing a list of invoice numbers. Each item should be a string representing one invoice number.

value_schema.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoiceNumbers.

parameters.name: filter_contact_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of ContactIDs to filter invoices.

value_schema.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of ContactIDs.

parameters.name: filter_by_statuses
parameters.description: Filter invoices by a list of statuses for improved response times. Use explicit parameters instead of OR conditions.

value_schema.description: Filter by a comma-separated list Statuses. For faster response times we recommend using these explicit parameters instead of passing OR conditions into the Where filter.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to retrieve. Up to 100 invoices per page can be returned.

value_schema.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 invoices will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each invoice

parameters.name: unit_decimal_places
parameters.description: Specify the number of decimal places for unit amounts, e.g., 4 for four decimal places.

value_schema.description: e.g. unitdp=4 – (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of invoice records to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: Number of records to retrieve per page

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: A case-insensitive search parameter for fields like InvoiceNumber and Reference.

value_schema.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the fields e.g. InvoiceNumber, Reference.

parameters.name: modified_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Return only records created or modified since this timestamp. Use the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'.

value_schema.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: include_archived_invoices
parameters.description: Set to true to include invoices with a status of ARCHIVED in the response.

value_schema.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Invoices with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: filter_by_created_by_my_app
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only invoices created by your app.

value_schema.description: When set to true you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

parameters.name: retrieve_summary_only
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve a smaller, lightweight version of the response for quicker API calls, excluding computation-heavy fields.

value_schema.description: Use summaryOnly=true in GET Contacts and Invoices endpoint to retrieve a smaller version of the response object. This returns only lightweight fields, excluding computation-heavy fields from the response, making the API calls quick and efficient.
